TechCats

The cats of people who make websites

Pudding

Pudding is a full-stack mischief-maker, equally skilled at swatting at front-end UI elements and stealing warm laptop spots. She has an impeccable sense of timing, always demanding attention the moment an important meeting starts.

Caretaker
